question_text:
Question 31 
 
[Environmental Engineering : Air Pollution]

PAGE
21

The primary air pollutant(s) is/are : 
 
(A) Sulphur dioxide 
(B) Lead 
 
(C) Ozone 
(D) Sulphuric acid 
Ans. (A, B)
explanation_text:
Sol. 
Primary air pollutants
(i)  
Lead
(ii)  
Oxides of Nitrogen
(iii) 
Oxides of Sulphur
(iv) 
Oxides of carbon
(v)  
Hydrocarbons
(vi) 
Volatile organic carbon
(vii)     Particular matter
Secondary air pollutants
(i)  
Acid rain
(ii)  
Photo chemical smog
(iii) 
PAN (peroxy acetyl nitrate)
(iv) 
Formeldyhyde
(v)  
Ozone
Hence, the correct options are (A) and (B).
